definitions.definition: An advance into enemy territory , an attempted invasion ; an encroachment , an incursion .
Often followed by in , into , or on : initial progress made toward accomplishing a goal or solving a problem .
examples: Three weeks into it, I am finally beginning to make inroads on this project.

main_definition: ( military , also figuratively ) An advance into enemy territory , an attempted invasion ; an encroachment , an incursion .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively , usually in the plural ) Often followed by in , into , or on : initial progress made toward accomplishing a goal or solving a problem .
